equipment.name: Dagger of Return
equipment.description: A dagger imbued with magical properties allowing the user to teleport short distances.

equipment.name: Red Knight's Armor
equipment.description: Heavy armor worn by knights of the Red Gate. Provides exceptional protection against physical attacks.

equipment.name: Shadow Cloak
equipment.description: A cloak infused with shadows, granting the wearer increased agility and stealth capabilities.

equipment.name: Eternal Frost Bow
equipment.description: A bow crafted from ice, capable of freezing enemies upon impact.

equipment.name: Guardian's Plate
equipment.description: Plate armor adorned with ancient runes, blessed by guardian spirits to enhance the wearer's defenses.

equipment.name: Ring of Infinite Wisdom
equipment.description: A mystical ring that enhances the wearer's intelligence and grants insight into complex situations.

equipment.name: Phoenix Blade
equipment.description: A legendary sword said to have been forged from the feathers of a phoenix. It burns with eternal flames.

equipment.name: Cloak of Invisibility
equipment.description: A magical cloak that renders the wearer invisible to both the naked eye and magical detection.

equipment.name: Giant's Gauntlets
equipment.description: Gauntlets crafted from the bones of giants, granting the wearer immense strength.

equipment.name: Sorcerer's Staff
equipment.description: A staff imbued with the power of elemental magic, capable of casting devastating spells.

equipment.name: Kasaka's Venom Fang
equipment.description: Kasaka's Venom Fang is a small black dagger with a white edge and a hilt made out of bones. On top of being able to grant its user an attack power boost of +25, the dagger also has two extra effects due to the fact that Kasaka's venom still remains inside it; Paralyze, which prevents a target from moving at a certain rate, and Bleed, which causes a target to lose 1% of their health for every second this effect is active and can potentially kill the said target from excessive blood loss.
